title: STAT+: As China’s drug industry races ahead, its GLP-1 race is accelerating too
description: To understand what China's fast-developing drug industry might mean for global pharmaceutical companies, look no further than the market for GLP-1 drugs.
content: To understand what China's fast-developing drug industry might mean for global pharmaceutical companies, look no further than the market for GLP-1 drugs.
